filterDescriptor.operationDescription: Routes the request to one of N subfilters based on request signature analysis.
OPC-intrinsic performs no operation (noop). When invoked via OPC.act, the effect is to perform no read/write operations on OPC-instanced shared memory. And, then perform an evaluation.

response.error: TransitionOperator threw an illegal exception that was handled by OPC: This is a forced exception thrown from a transition operator's body function.
